sentences.sentence: If you come to my home, I invite you to taste lychees, longan, pineapple and so on.
sentences.translation: 如果你来到我的家乡，我请你吃荔枝，龙眼，菠萝等。

sentences.sentence: Since moving back to the US, I admit that I do miss eating fresh lychees and dragon fruit .
sentences.translation: 自从我搬回美国后，我承认有时候确实会很怀念中国的新鲜荔枝和火龙果。

sentences.sentence: The forests are full of Java plums, mahogany, teak and acacia trees, hanging oranges, lychees, coconuts, pineapples and tea-tree shrubs
sentences.translation: 森林里莲雾树、桃花心木、柚木、金合欢、茶树林立，橙子、荔枝、椰子、菠萝果实累累。
